verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> slept אֲבִיָּ֜ה <S%H29><s%> So Abijah עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֗יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <S%H6912><s%> and they buried אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> him in the city דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אָסָ֥א <S%H609><s%> and Asa בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּ֑יו <S%H8478><s%> his place בְּיָמָ֛יו <S%H3117><s%> in his stead In his days שָׁקְטָ֥ה <S%H8252><s%> was quiet הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land עֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years פ

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did אָסָא֙ <S%H609><s%> And Asa הַטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that which was] good וְהַיָּשָׁ֔ר <S%H3477><s%> and right בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> his God

וַיָּ֛סַר <S%H5493><s%> For he took away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּח֥וֹת <S%H4196><s%> the altars הַנֵּכָ֖ר <S%H5236><s%> of the strange וְהַבָּמ֑וֹת <S%H1116><s%> [gods] and the high places וַיְשַׁבֵּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> and brake down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּצֵּב֔וֹת <S%H4676><s%> the images וַיְגַדַּ֖ע <S%H1438><s%> and cut down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲשֵׁרִֽים׃ <S%H842><s%> the groves

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And commanded לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah לִדְר֕וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to do הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> the law וְהַמִּצְוָֽה׃ <S%H4687><s%> and the commandment

וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <S%H5493><s%> Also he took away מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחַמָּנִ֑ים <S%H2553><s%> and the images וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> was quiet הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> and the kingdom לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיִּ֛בֶן <S%H1129><s%> And he built עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> cities מְצוּרָ֖ה <S%H4694><s%> fenced בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since שָׁקְטָ֣ה <S%H8252><s%> had rest הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the land וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> and there עִמּ֤וֹ <S%H5973><s%> at מִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> and he had no war בַּשָּׁנִ֣ים <S%H8141><s%> in those years הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> those כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because הֵנִ֥יחַ <S%H5117><s%> had given him rest יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Therefore he said לִֽיהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> unto Judah נִבְנֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H1129><s%> Let us build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְנָסֵ֨ב <S%H5437><s%> and make about חוֹמָ֣ה <S%H2346><s%> [them] walls וּמִגְדָּלִים֮ <S%H4026><s%> and towers דְּלָתַ֣יִם <S%H1817><s%> gates וּבְרִיחִים֒ <S%H1280><s%> and bars עוֹדֶ֨נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> is still הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [while] the land לְפָנֵ֗ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> [is] yet before כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because דָרַ֙שְׁנוּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> us because we have sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God דָּרַ֕שְׁנוּ <S%H1875><s%> we have sought וַיָּ֥נַֽח <S%H5117><s%> [him] and he hath given us rest לָ֖נוּ מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> on every side וַיִּבְנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> So they built וַיַּצְלִֽיחוּ׃ <S%H6743><s%> and prospered פ

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become לְאָסָ֗א <S%H609><s%> And Asa חַיִל֮ <S%H2428><s%> had an army נֹשֵׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> [of men] that bare צִנָּ֣ה <S%H6793><s%> targets וָרֹמַח֒ <S%H7420><s%> and spears מִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> out of Judah שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand ס וּמִבִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> and out of Benjamin נֹשְׂאֵ֤י <S%H5375><s%> that bare מָגֵן֙ <S%H4043><s%> shields וְדֹ֣רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> and drew קֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bows מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> all these [were] mighty men חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> of valour

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> And there came out אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> against זֶ֣רַח <S%H2226><s%> against them Zerah הַכּוּשִׁ֗י <S%H3569><s%> the Ethiopian בְּחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> with an host אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> of a thousand אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמַרְכָּב֖וֹת <S%H4818><s%> chariots שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָרֵשָֽׁה׃ <S%H4762><s%> unto Mareshah

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went out אָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> Then Asa לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> against וַיַּֽעַרְכוּ֙ <S%H6186><s%> in array מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> him and they set the battle בְּגֵ֥יא <S%H1516><s%> in the valley צְפַ֖תָה <S%H6859><s%> of Zephathah לְמָרֵשָֽׁה׃ <S%H4762><s%> at Mareshah

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> cried אָסָ֜א <S%H609><s%> And Asa אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֮ <S%H430><s%> his God וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there עִמְּךָ֤ <S%H5973><s%> besides לַעְזוֹר֙ <S%H5826><s%> [it is] nothing with thee to help בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> whether רַב֙ <S%H7227><s%> with many לְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> or with them that have no power עָזְרֵ֜נוּ <S%H5826><s%> help יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> us O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> our God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against נִשְׁעַ֔נּוּ <S%H8172><s%> for we rest וּבְשִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> on thee and in thy name בָ֔אנוּ <S%H935><s%> we go עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הֶהָמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> against this multitude הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> thou [art] our God אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יַעְצֹ֥ר <S%H6113><s%> prevail עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> against אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H582><s%> let not man ס

וַיִּגֹּ֤ף <S%H5062><s%> smote יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכּוּשִׁ֔ים <S%H3569><s%> the Ethiopians לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אָסָ֖א <S%H609><s%> Asa וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> and before יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled הַכּוּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H3569><s%> and the Ethiopians

וַיִּרְדְּפֵ֨ם <S%H7291><s%> that [were] with him pursued אָסָ֜א <S%H609><s%> And Asa וְהָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עִמּוֹ֮ <S%H5973><s%> as עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far לִגְרָר֒ <S%H1642><s%> them unto Gerar וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> were overthrown מִכּוּשִׁים֙ <S%H3569><s%> and the Ethiopians לְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִֽחְיָ֔ה <S%H4241><s%> that they could not recover כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׁבְּר֥וּ <S%H7665><s%> themselves for they were destroyed לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> and before מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <S%H4264><s%> his host וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they carried away שָׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> spoil הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> very

וַיַּכּ֗וּ <S%H5221><s%> And they smote אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶֽעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> all the cities סְבִיב֣וֹת <S%H5439><s%> round about גְּרָ֔ר <S%H1642><s%> Gerar כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had fallen פַֽחַד־ <S%H6343><s%> for the fear יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> on וַיָּבֹ֙זּוּ֙ <S%H962><s%> came upon them and they spoiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> all the cities כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בִזָּ֥ה <S%H961><s%> spoil רַבָּ֖ה <S%H7227><s%> for there was exceeding much הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had fallen בָהֶֽם׃

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָהֳלֵ֥י <S%H168><s%> also the tents מִקְנֶ֖ה <S%H4735><s%> of cattle הִכּ֑וּ <S%H5221><s%> They smote וַיִּשְׁבּ֨וּ <S%H7617><s%> and carried away צֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep לָרֹב֙ <S%H7230><s%> in abundance וּגְמַלִּ֔ים <S%H1581><s%> and camels וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and returned יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem ס
